comment.author: 14142328@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Llandrindod Wells, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 14142328@N04
comment._content: Thanks for adding it to the group.  I live opposite this building and I love the car just parked in the middle of the road in this shot.  The area has certainly changed now.

comment.author: 9526509@N04
comment._content: Wow, spanglenn, do you happen to have an updated photo?

comment.author: 14142328@N04
comment._content:
Hi
I could go out and take one but the front of the building is covered in scaffolding at the moment, did you just want it linked to this photo to compare them or want one for yourself.

comment.author: 14142328@N04
comment._content: I've found a photo taken by someone else: www.flickr.com/photos/lilo_lil/2661059639/

comment.author: 9526509@N04
comment._content: I did see that one.  What a wonderful building, and a nice view for you to have as you leave your flat every day (scaffolding notwithstanding.)  Thanks!

comment.author: 14142328@N04
comment._content: Right.  Yes, it is lovely and was originally built as a hotel.  Lovely architecture in this town - mostly Victorian.

comment.author: 65154586@N02
comment._content: A great picture everything looks so clean, I love the car just parked anywhere :-)
